body_html:
That is correct -- and while the C API in 0.10.0RC0 is almost there, it's
not quite done.

On Tue, Aug 9, 2016 at 7:28 AM chrisber notifications@github.com wrote:

My guess is that tensorflow is currently developing a c-api which then can
be used with swig to build wrappers for multiple languages.
Take a look at:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commits/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

body:
That is correct -- and while the C API in 0.10.0RC0 is almost there, it's
not quite done.

On Tue, Aug 9, 2016 at 7:28 AM chrisber notifications@github.com wrote:

> My guess is that tensorflow is currently developing a c-api which then can
> be used with swig to build wrappers for multiple languages.
> Take a look at:
> https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commits/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h
>
